system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining @Affliction[burn] 5.

Requirement: [Fire] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Fire-Type attack on the user's Active List.
